nodes.text: The Great Hall was located in the Bakur Memorial Building in Salis D'aar on the planet Bakura. Essentially a large corridor that connected the Bakuran Senate Chamber to the building's tram station, it was a traditional gathering place for politicians, businessmen and civic leaders.

The floor was a thick, black carpet with a row of columns made from expensive marble with gold tracing. One wall of the Great Hall had a bank of storage lockers for each senator, with hand print locks for security purposes. Entrances to the tram station and Senate Chamber were guarded by members of the Bakuran Honor Guard.
